export default function SplitData(Word){var Arr=Word.split('
');var Name=Arr[0].split(' ')[2];var Data_chat=[];var Adding=function Adding(index){Data_chat.push({date:Arr[i].split(' ')[1],person:Arr[index].split('	')[1],context:Arr[index].split('	')[2]});};for(var i=3;i<Arr.length;i++){var j=i+1,k=j;while(true){if(j==Arr.length-1||Arr[j]==""&&(Arr[j+1][5]=="/"||Arr[j+1][6]=="/")){if(j!=Arr.length-1)Adding(j-1);i=j;break;}else if(Arr[j]=="")Arr[k]+='
'+Arr[j];if(Arr[j][2]!=":")Arr[k]+='
'+Arr[j];else{Adding(k);k=j;}j++;}}return{Name:Name,data:Data_chat};}
